name: Laser Room (Jeremy_Li)
description:
This is a puzzle game where you move around blocks to block out lasers (the red tiles - you're going to have to use your imagination) and your goal is to get to the green tile without being fried.

I have uploaded the source code for anyone to download (though be warned that it is pretty messy). NOTE: My project uses glfw as a dependency and I have not included glfw with my source code.

Controls:

 - Use the arrow keys to move

 - If you get soft-locked or want to restart, press R

What does this game have to do with the Theme?

Lasers are futuristic technology so it kind of fits (I didn't really have any good ideas and this was the best one that I had)
